title: 94/834/EC: Commission Decision of 15 December 1994 approving the Community support framework for Community structural measures to improve the processing and marketing conditions for agricultural and forestry products in Italy, Non-objective 1 Regions, in respect of Objective 5a (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 December 1994 approving the Community support framework for Community structural measures to improve the processing and marketing conditions for agricultural and forestry products in Italy, Non-objective 1 Regions, in  respect of Objective 5 (a) (Only the Italian text is authentic) (94/834/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Community support framework for structural measures involving improvement of the processing and marketing conditions for agricultural and forestry products in Italy, Non-objective 1 Regions, and covering the period from 1 January 1994 to  31 December 1999, is hereby approved.
The Commisson intends to contribute to the implementation of this Community support framework according to the detailed provisions which it contains and in accordance with the rules and guidelines of the Structural Funds and the other existing financial  instruments.

The sectors selected for joint action shall be as follows:
- meat,
- eggs,
- milk and milk products,
- cereals,
- oilseeds: olive oil,
- wine and alcohol,
- fruit and vegetables,
- flowers and plants,
- seeds,
- other plants: medicinal crops, mushrooms,
- forestry products.
The total budget proposed for EAGGF aid shall be ECU 185 626 000.

For the purposes of indexation, the annual breakdown of the planned maximum overall allocation for assistance from the EAGGF Guidance Section shall be as follows:
